resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108141</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108141</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206538</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Two American Entrepreneurs: Madam C.J. Walker and J.C. Penney</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwei Amerikanische Unternehmer: Frau C.J. 
Walker und J.C. Penney</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Deux Entrepreneurs Américains : Madame C.J.
Walker et J.C. Penney</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dois Empreendedores Americanos: Senhora C.J.
Walker e J.C. Penney</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Due Imprenditori Americani: Signora C.J. 
Walker e J.C. Penney</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύο αμερικανικοί επιχειρηματίες: Κυρία C.J. 
περιπατητής και J.C. Penney</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dos Empresarios Americanos: Señora C.J. 
Walker y J.C. Penney</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">features the life stories of two business people who lived the American Dream and who helped make that dream a reality for others in their communities. It tells how Walker, an African American woman, and Penney, a former tuberculosis patient, built from scratch their multi-million and billion dollar businesses.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kennzeichnet die Lebengeschichten von zwei 
Geschäft Leuten, die der amerikanische Traum lebten und die halfen, 
diesen Traum eine Wirklichkeit für andere in ihren Gemeinschaften zu 
bilden. Sie erklärt wie Wanderer, eine afrikanische 
amerikanische Frau und Penney, ein ehemaliger Tuberkulosepatient, vom 
Kratzer ihr multi-million und Milliarde Dollargeschäfte aufgebaut.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">comporte les histoires de la vie de deux personnes
d'affaires qui ont vécu le rêve américain et qui ont aidé à faire
à ce rêve une réalité pour d'autres dans leurs communautés. 
Elle indique que marcheur, une femme américaine africaine, et 
Penney, un ancien patient de tuberculose, établi à partir de zéro 
leur multi-million et milliard d'entreprises du dollar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">caracteriza as histórias da vida de dois povos do
negócio que viveram o sonho americano e que ajudaram fazer a esse 
sonho uma realidade para outra em suas comunidades. Diz como 
walker, uma mulher americana africana, e Penney, um paciente anterior 
do tuberculosis, construído do risco seu multi-million e bilhão 
negócios do dólar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">caratterizza le storia di vita di due genti di 
affari che ha vissuto il sogno americano e che ha contribuito a 
rendere a quel sogno una realtà per altre nelle loro Comunità. 
Dice a come camminatore, una donna americana africana e Penney, 
un ex paziente di tubercolosi, sviluppato da zero il loro 
multi-million e miliardo commerci del dollaro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χαρακτηρίζει τις ιστορίες ζωής δύο επιχειρησιακών 
ανθρώπων που έζησαν το αμερικανικό όνειρο και που βοήθησαν να 
κάνουν εκείνο το όνειρο μια πραγματικότητα για άλλους στις 
κοινότητές τους. Λέει πώς ο περιπατητής, μια αφρικανική 
αμερικανική γυναίκα, και Penney, ένας προηγούμενος ασθενής 
φυματίωσης, έχτισαν από την αρχή τις multi-million και 
επιχειρήσεις δισεκατομμύριο δολαρίων τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ofrece las historias de la vida de dos personas 
del negocio que vivieron el sueño americano y que ayudaron a hacer 
ese sueño una realidad para otras en sus comunidades. Dice 
cómo walker, una mujer americana africana, y Penney, paciente 
anterior de la tuberculosis, construido de rasguño su multi-million y
mil millones negocios del dólar.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206538</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108141</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/two-american-entrepreneurs-madam-c-j-walker-and-j-c-penney</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
